targets.expr: (sum(cannyls_data_allocator_allocated_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum(cannyls_data_allocator_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})) / sum(cannyls_data_region_capacity_bytes{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

max((sum by(device)(cannyls_data_allocator_allocated_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum by(device)(cannyls_data_allocator_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})) / sum by(device)(cannyls_data_region_capacity_bytes{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}))

(sum(cannyls_journal_queue_consumed_bytes_total{job =~"$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum(cannyls_journal_queue_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})) / sum(cannyls_journal_queue_capacity_bytes{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

sum by (instance)(cannyls_device_enqueued_commands_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"} - cannyls_device_dequeued_commands_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

sum by (instance, device)(cannyls_device_enqueued_commands_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"} - cannyls_device_dequeued_commands_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

sum by(instance)(cannyls_storage_put_lumps_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum by(instance)(cannyls_storage_delete_lumps_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

(sum(cannyls_journal_queue_consumed_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum(cannyls_journal_queue_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})) / sum(cannyls_journal_queue_capacity_bytes{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

max((sum by(device)(cannyls_journal_queue_consumed_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum by(device)(cannyls_journal_queue_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})) / sum by(device)(cannyls_journal_queue_capacity_bytes{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}))

sum by(type)(cannyls_journal_queue_enqueued_records_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum by(type)(cannyls_journal_queue_dequeued_records_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

panels.title: Number of Enqueuing/Dequeuing of GC Records

targets.expr: (sum by (instance, device)(cannyls_data_allocator_allocated_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum by (instance, device)(cannyls_data_allocator_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})) / sum by (instance, device)(cannyls_data_region_capacity_bytes{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

sum by(instance)(cannyls_data_allocator_allocated_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum by(instance)(cannyls_data_allocator_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"})

topk(10, sum by(instance, device)(cannyls_data_allocator_allocated_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}) - sum by(instance, device)(cannyls_data_allocator_released_bytes_total{job =~ "$job", instance =~ "$instance", device =~ "$device"}))
